Metadata.Title: Kill Order: The genius and the general
Metadata.Description: A contract has been issued, and you have been cleared to engage. Eliminate Cilas Netzke, Jasper Knight, the two soldiers and the security guard  as cleanly as possible, avoiding collateral damage as far as possible. Only kill the targets, if possible stay in the time frame, dead or unconcious bodies may not be found, if a shot is fired at an NPC it has to be a headshot.Do not change your starting disguise or you will immediatly fail the mission!
